newsitem.title: USA: Northeast says Millstone nuke 3 is priority.
newsitem.headline: Northeast says Millstone nuke 3 is priority.

text.p: The head of Northeast Utilities' troubled nuclear operations said Tuesday that 1,150 megawatt (MW) Millstone nuclear ppwer unit 3 would be the lead unit in the current recovery process.
"The logic for selecting unit 3 is fairly straight forward," said Northeast Nuclear Energy Co president and chief executive officer Bruce Kenyon.

"The situation among the units is relatively equal. I have said from the beginning that if these circumstances were to arise then I would pick the largest since its return to service will mean the most for the energy needs of this region," he added.
